comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Thanks all members who replied here or contacted me through telegram. Now no more need any loan. Actually I need for swap purpose but I missed the bot    (Time over)Now I am locking this thread, If I need in future, maybe I open. I am still very happy to see that how Bitcointalk members are helping each other.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on December 24, 2023, 05:02:35 PMDate: 24 DEC 2023Need 300$ usdt oan again urgently, Payment accept:Bsc address :0xe6242d1f179d36eb000686bfc04913921b1ef6a9orI will dm binance uidI understand that the forum is magnanimous enough to allow for certain flexibilities such as this and many more but I also consider it candid that maybe what you often need the 300 USDT for might also have forum members eligible and they also will want to take the risk. You mind sharing the information with us let us also take advantage of the opportunity that exists therein as I believe it is  for many apeople and not just you.
